laboratory_examinations.findings: The appendix is abnormal, with mucosal hyperemia and mural thickening with mild adjacent fat stranding. Diameter measures up to 12 mm. Findings are concerning for ____ versus ulcerative colitis flare involving the ____. Diffuse mucosal hyperemia of the colon with mild thickening of the colonic wall, most notable in the transverse colon. Prominent vasa recta along the transverse colon with multiple prominent/reactive mesenteric lymph nodes measuring up to 1.0 cm.
